issue.title: <frame/>: Support multiple frames in a single parent? Intended scope of frames? Use link names as frames?

content.raw: I've spent some time reviewing pull request #468 (branch `pose_dom`) and recently made pull request #505 targeted against `pose_dom` to fix some errors in its implementation but largely following its current design. I'll answer some of your questions 1-9 based on my understanding of the code in these two pull request and discuss where they are currently lacking. I'll address each question in a separate comment.
content.html: I've spent some time reviewing pull request #468 (branch pose_dom) and recently made pull request #505 targeted against pose_dom to fix some errors in its implementation but largely following its current design. I'll answer some of your questions 1-9 based on my understanding of the code in these two pull request and discuss where they are currently lacking. I'll address each question in a separate comment.
